article.title: Work Products, Artifacts, Documents, Code, etc.
article.label: Deliverables
article.intro: Read about project Deliverables provided during the project lifecycle
article.keywords: continuous integration, software outsourcing, offshore development, distributed programming,

text.p: Deliverables are what you pay for and what the project team produces. There is nothing more important in a project than the Deliverables.
Project documentation includes, but is not delivered under contract:
You have an access to all project documentation, but we are not contractually obliged to deliver it.

concepts.c1: SRS is the core project specification document that explains the functionality
concepts.c3: Iterations constitute project timeline in an incremental manner
concepts.c5: Schedule is a high-level project plan that leads to project completion
